name: Which One Does Not Belong? Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Dachshund, Siamese, Poodle, Pointer.
questions.explanation:
Siamese.

	The Siamese is a cat, the others are breeds of dog.

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Middle, index, card, ring.
questions.explanation:
Card.

	Middle, index and ring are all names for your fingers.

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Amy Tan, Lewis Carroll, George Eliot, Mark Twain (in terms of pen name).
questions.explanation:
Amy Tan & Tan &AT.

	Amy Tan is a real author's name; the others are pseudonyms.

questions.text: Which one does not belong?  Mustang, Jaguar, Lion, Impala (in terms of automobiles).
questions.explanation:
Lion.

	The others are all names of cars. 'Impala' is a kind of antelope, so it is an animal too.

questions.text: Which one does not belong as it is not an anagram of the others?  Pits, pots, opts, tops.
questions.explanation:
Pits.

	Pots, opts, and tops are all anagrams of each other.

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Outlay, assay, essay, eBay (in terms of Pig Latin).
questions.explanation:
Essay.

	The others, when pronounced, are words in Pig Latin (lout, sass, bee) (ughh...I know!)

questions.text: Which one does not belong due to pronunciation? Entrance, architect, convert, does.
questions.explanation:
architect.

	The meanings of the other words change depending on how they are pronounced.

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Bee, act, jay, see.
questions.explanation:
act.

	The other words, pronounced, are letters of the alphabet.

questions.text: Which one does not belong because it is not part of a horse's hoof? Piano, frog, sole, coronet.
questions.explanation:
Piano.

	The others are parts of a horse's hoof. Not instruments... a cornet is an instrument, but a coronet is not.

questions.text: Which one does not belong? Moon, Sun, Loki, Thor, Woden, Freya.
questions.explanation:
Loki.

	The days of the week are derived from the other words (Moon-day=Monday, Sun-Day, Thor's day= Thursday, Woden's day= Wednesday, Freya's day= Friday)
